column4: I'm looking for a nice distro that could be easily modified(very openly open-source, perhaps?) and very nice for hacking, probably with some default programming code readers, etc. Has anyone got an idea of what I could use? Or perhaps Ubuntu is the one I'm looking for?
any distribution will be fine, pick whichever you like
if you have no idea, tho, ubuntu (or debian) would ab ea nice choice.
sounds likee this conversation is more approriate for #gentoo
